replies.author: YuriPrime
replies.txt_content:
IC2 ALT KEY:未知
IC2 BOOST KEY:量子靴子的高跳功能
IC2 MODE SWITCH KEY:切换模式，可以用于镭射，飞行背包，电力扳手等
IC2 SIDE INVENTORY KEY:未知
IC2 HUB EXPAND KEY:未知
